title: expandPath
name: expandPath
description:
Creates an absolute, platform-appropriate path that is
        equivalent to the value of relative_path, appended to the base
        path. This function (despite its name) can accept an absolute
        or relative path in the relative_path attribute

arguments.name: relative_path
arguments.description: Relative or absolute directory reference or filename, within the current directory, (.\\ and ..\\) to convert to an absolute path. Can include forward or backward slashes.
